text: Gordon F. Joseloff (May 13, 1945 â€“ November 9, 2020) was the First Selectman of Westport, Connecticut and an Emmy Award-winning journalist. He was elected in 2005 with almost 60 percent of the vote and re-elected in 2009 with almost 52 percent. He earlier served 14 years on the Westport Representative Town Meeting (RTM), the town's legislative body, including 10 as its moderator, or president. A former foreign correspondent for CBS News and United Press International, Joseloff is also known as founding editor and publisher of WestportNow, a local news and information website for Westport he established in 2003. ==References== Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Journalists from Connecticut Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democrats (United States) Category:American Emmy Award winners
title: Gordon Joseloff
